story_28_05000/2401_1001_0100_10:
What is going on here?! This wasn’t how today
was supposed to go at all!
story_28_05000/2401_1001_0200_10:
What happened to our backup? Where’s the rest
of Team Break?!
story_28_05000/2401_1001_0400_10:
We thwarted every last Team Break hideout on
Pasio. Most of your members have already
been captured.
story_28_05000/2401_1001_0500_10:
You and the other goons in this arena are all
that remain.
story_28_05000/2401_1001_0600_10:
What?! Y-you’re lying! There’s no way any of
that is true!
story_28_05000/2401_1001_0700_10:
Look around. The fact that your backup crew
never showed up should be proof enough.
story_28_05000/2401_1001_0800_10:
Now, why don’t you give up this farce and
accept your fate.
story_28_05000/2401_1001_1000_10: The only thing that matters is defeating you!
story_28_05000/2401_1001_1600_10: Hmph. Trying to get back at me for earlier?
story_28_05000/2401_1001_1700_10:
We can’t have you getting hurt before we face
you in the semifinals, now can we?
story_28_05000/2401_1001_1800_10:
Hmph. In that case, why don’t you make
yourselves useful.
story_28_05000/2401_1001_1900_10:
[Name:PlayerNickname ]! Cheren!
Give me a hand here!
story_28_05000/2401_1001_2000_10:
Let’s put an end to this fight against Team Break,
right here and now—
